name: Toyota
description: Japanese multinational automotive manufacturer known for reliability and innovation.

name: Honda
description: Japanese public multinational conglomerate manufacturer of automobiles, motorcycles, and power equipment.

name: BMW
description: German multinational company which produces luxury vehicles and motorcycles.

description: German luxury automotive brand known for premium vehicles, buses, coaches, and trucks.

description: South Korean multinational automotive manufacturer known for value and warranty.

description: American multinational automaker with a rich history in automotive innovation.

name: Chevrolet

description: Japanese multinational automobile manufacturer known for innovation and performance.

name: Volkswagen
description: German automaker known for quality engineering and popular models worldwide.
